title: Adds setText() and setTextWithoutAnimation()
message:
Adds setText() and setTextWithoutAnimation()

This allows you to more easily programmatically set the text of the EditText and completes Issue #23.

title: Fix for issue #22, removes app icon
message:
Fix for issue #22, removes app icon

This removes the ic_launcher.png icon for the library and removes the
reference in the AndroidManifest to avoid conflicts.

title: Remove allowBackup attribute from <application>
message:
Remove allowBackup attribute from <application>

This causes lint conflicts with the project it can be used in since both define allowBackup

title: Updated version in README to 1.0.2
message: Updated version in README to 1.0.2

title: Prep for 1.0.2 push to Maven Central
message:
Prep for 1.0.2 push to Maven Central

This updates the build configs, removes the unused theme, and adds a
changelog.

title: Removed theme from library
message:
Removed theme from library

This removes the reference to the AppTheme from the manifest to
eliminate issues with manifest mergers such as described in Issue #14.

title: Fix for RTL languages
message:
Fix for RTL languages

Fixes the gravity for right-to-left languages.

title: Fix for retaining focus, issue #13
message:
Fix for retaining focus, issue #13

This change saves the EditText's focus status in the saved state and restores it with the first measure.

title: Added Google Play link to readme
message: Added Google Play link to readme

title: Added simple AboutActivity
message:
Added simple AboutActivity

MainActivity ActionBar overflow now has an About link that goes to the
AboutActivity.  The AboutActivity just gives a brief summary of the
library and provides an ActionBar button to go to GitHub.

title: Formatting fix for README.md
message:
Formatting fix for README.md

Fixed an ending code tag that was missing its slash.

title: Partial support for nextFocus* attributes
message:
Partial support for nextFocus* attributes

You can now add any of the five nextFocus attributes to an instance of
the FloatLabel in XML.  The main problem is that you cannot currently
focus on another FloatLabel since the view ID of the EditText is always
the same.

title: Updated for the v1.0.1 release to Maven Central
message:
Updated for the v1.0.1 release to Maven Central

This release fixes issue #9, which was that the floatLabelColor
attribute did not work with the Maven Central release.

title: Updated for build tools 19.1, gradle tools 12.2
message:
Updated for build tools 19.1, gradle tools 12.2

This is just an update to the build.gradle files so that they work
without change in Android Studio 0.8.6.

title: Added info for Maven Central and related projects
message:
Added info for Maven Central and related projects

https://github.com/IanGClifton/AndroidFloatLabel/issues/2
https://github.com/IanGClifton/AndroidFloatLabel/issues/3

This updates the README.md to include a brief example of using maven for
the dependency in gradle and links to a v9+ compatible fork of the
project.

title: Gradle changes to support deploy to maven central
message:
Gradle changes to support deploy to maven central

This relies on the gradle-mvn-push script by Chris Banes. Updates can be
pushed to maven central with gradlew clean build uploadArchives.
